QuestData.Title: Ancient Mana
QuestData.Description: Without the Nightwell to feed upon, my comrades and I will have to live off the land itself.$B$BAncient mana from the underground leylines can reach the surface in many forms, most commonly as crystals or gems.$B$B<Thalyssra picks up a small stone and, whispering words of power, traces a rune upon it with her fingertip.>$B$BThis stone will glow when ancient mana is nearby. Please gather as much as possible! It will be a precious resource in the weeks to come.
QuestData.CompletionText: We need all the ancient mana we can get. Make sure you know how to find it!
QuestData.RewardText: Keep a lookout for those crystal formations all over Suramar. We will need them.
